message: "People who attend the Listen With Your Heart concert Friday, Oct. 5, at First United Methodist Church can contribute donations to ATLAST, or Attorneys Targeting Labor And Sex Trafficking, a program from the nonprofit Administer Justice in Elgin that provides pro-bono legal services to victims."

data.description: An Elgin church will host a concert to benefit the fight against human trafficking, which experts say victimizes tens of thousands of people in the Chicago area.
data.title: Elgin concert will help in fight against sex, labor trafficking
